analysis_parameters.description: n: number of top/bottom towns in tendency groups; high_threshold: minimum % for high tendency; low_threshold: minimum % for low tendency; display_threshold: minimum overall frequency %

output_options.description: format: json|markdown|txt|html; include_statistics: add detailed stats; max_results_per_category: limit displayed results

data_sources.description: village_registry: path to source data file; cache_parsed_data: save parsed data for faster loading

analyzer_settings.description: use_optimized: use OptimizedTendencyAnalyzer for better performance; precompute_frequencies: calculate all frequencies at init; enable_caching: cache intermediate results

filtering_options.description: min_villages_per_town: exclude towns with fewer villages; exclude_towns/include_only_towns: filter specific towns; filter_parentheses: remove (content) from names

export_settings.description: output_directory: where to save results; filename_template: naming pattern; auto_export: automatically save after analysis; export_formats: list of formats to export

advanced_options.description: parallel_processing: use multiprocessing for large datasets; max_workers: number of parallel workers; verbose_logging: detailed output; debug_mode: extra debugging info
